Header: Body of a female found Eheliyagoda paddy field
Content: A body of a female has been found in a paddy field in the Dole-watta area in Eheliyagoda. The police stated the 17-year-old is a resident of Kirilla in Hindurangala. The magistrateâ€™s examination has been carried out while the post-mortem examination is scheduled to be carried out on Saturday, June 4.
